Package org.sbml.squeezer.gui

This package contains all necessary classes for the graphical user interface.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CloseIcon The class which generates the 'X' icon for the tabs.
GUITools A convenient class that provides several handy methods for working with graphical user interfaces.
JBrowser A Browser like Editor pane.
JHelpBrowser This is a specialized dialog that displays HTML pages and contains a toolbar with two buttons for jumping forward or backward in the history of visited pages.
JTabbedPaneWithCloseIcons A JTabbedPane which has a close ('X') icon on each tab.
KineticLawSelectionDialog This is the main GUI class.
KineticLawSelectionPanel A panel, which contains all possible kinetic equations for the current reaction.
KineticLawTable Creates a table that displays all created kinetic equationns.
KineticLawTableCellRenderer A renderer that paints the background of every second row white or in light blue.
KineticLawTableModel Data model for the KineticLawTable that determins, which information is displayed there and it provides methods to access comlumn or row names and single elements in the table.
KineticLawWindowAdapter This class allows SBMLsqueezer to create a kinetic law interactively for just one reaction.
LayoutHelper A helper class that provides several methods for working with a GridBagLayout.
SBasePanel A specialized JPanel that displays all available properties of a given SBase in a GUI.
SBMLModelSplitPane A specialized JSplitPane that displays a JTree containing all model elements of a JSBML model on the left hand side and an SBasePanel showing details of the active element in the tree on the right hand side.
SBMLsqueezerUI The central class for SBMLsqueezer's graphical user interface.
SBMLTree A specialized JTree that shows the elements of a JSBML model as a hierarchical structure.
SettingsDialog A specialized JDialog that shows several configuration options in a JTabbedPane, provides a button for applying the choosed selection and also to restore the default settings.
SettingsPanelAll A JPanel containing a JTabbedPane with several options for the configuration of SBMLsqueezer in a GUI.
SettingsPanelDefaultMechanisms A JPanel to let the user select all default instances of BasicKineticLaw that implement the designated interfaces to be available for certain reaction types.
SettingsPanelKinetics This class is a panel, which contains all necessary options to be specified for an appropriate creation of kinetic laws.
SettingsPanelLaTeX A JPanel to configure all necessary options to perform a LaTeX export of a model.
SystemBrowser Provides a method to open the default browser of the window system under the user's operating system when following a hyper link.
UpdateMessage This class implements a JWindow object which is shown on the bottom right corner of the screen.
 

Enum Summary
SBMLsqueezerUI.Command This is what the graphical user interface of SBMLsqueezer can do...
 

Package org.sbml.squeezer.gui Description

This package contains all necessary classes for the graphical user interface.
